title: vault
description: Seed phrase, lock status, and key management. DANGEROUS — exposes master key.

phrase.description: 24-word BIP39 seed phrase. NEVER log, display, or transmit.

seed.description: Seed as hex (0x-prefixed). NEVER log or transmit.

x-agent-warnings: CRITICAL: This command exposes the seed phrase — the MASTER KEY for all funds
NEVER log, display in UI, or transmit the seed phrase or seed hex
If the seed is lost, funds are UNRECOVERABLE
ALWAYS require explicit user confirmation before executing vault
wipekeys and restorekeys are DESTRUCTIVE operations — require double confirmation
